name: IR Repeater Kit, ir Repeater System，IR Remote Control Extender .Supports up to 100 feet， Dual Sensors Receiver
short_description: 1) The Hidden IR Repeater System allows you to use an existing infrared (IR) remote control to operate up to 32 audio/ideo (A/V) components located behind closed doors or walls in an entertainment cabinet or equipment closet.
2) Allows IR signals to pass through solid doors or walls, line-of-sight to the components is not required Confirmation LED built-in to the IR receiver acknowledges receipt of IR commands.
3) Works with practically all brands of Audio/Video IR remote controls,provides one IR Receiver input and 4 IR Emitters outputs.
4) Confirmation LED built-in to the IR receiver acknowledges receipt of IR commands.

5) The built-in IR distribution technology gives you the ability to conceal, yet still control, bulky electronic equipment such as a cable or satellite TV receiver, stereo receiver or amplifier, CD player, DVD player, Blu-ray player, or virtually any component controlled by an IR signal.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #22,291 in Electronics ( See Top 100 in Electronics ) #22 in Remote Control Extenders

name: CERRXIAN Infrared Remote Control Extender Cable, IR Repeater Hidden Cable with IR Signal Receiver & IR Emitter & USB Power Cable (2M/6.5ft)
short_description: IR REMOTE CONTROL - Simplify your entertainment center by hiding your cable box, receiver, amp, Roku & other IR controlled devices hidden behind cabinet doors and a wall. No more boxes placing on the shelf or leaving cabinet doors open when your watching TV just so you can use your remote control!This was a very economical and effective way to make it happen.

EASY TO USE - Plug the USB into your TV, set top box or a 5V wall adapter(adapter not included) for supply power, then paste the IR emitter(small end) using it's own adhesive over on the device with an IR sensor you wish to control(up to 10cm/3.9inch).Lastly, place the IR receiver(big end) end in the line of sight of your remote control (up to 10m/ 32ft).
WIDE BAND TECHNOLOGY - 20-60KHZ,works on most infrared control devices(not RF)! Suitable for infrared remote control, infrared extender, DVD player, STB box,Cisco,DirecTV,Roku, Sony, Yamaha,etc.

EXCELLENT SIGNAL RANGE - 180 degree IR receiving angle provides enough space for your remote control to get the right angle. The remote control signal receives a real-time response and moves forward quickly without delay.

HIDDEN DEVICES - Devices that require remote control must be placed where you cannot directly control your remote control. Otherwise, the signal from the remote control and the forwarded remote control signal will be sent to the set-top box at the same time. Signals out of sync can interfere with each other and cause them to stop working.
product_description: Do many cable boxes, A/V receivers, media players, or other IR-controlled equipment confuse your entertainment center? If you only have a short distance to move them to a closed position, but this prevents you from using them with a remote control, using CERRXIAN Infrared Remote Control Extender Cable cable is the ideal solution to your problem! Home theater accessory repeats the IR signal to a DVD player, STB box, Receiver or other A/V source with an IR sensor; Route the infrared remote control extender cable out of sight with a wall mounted TV; Install the IR Transmitter end in a concealed equipment closet to hide a catv box and control it remotely. Specifications: 1.Connector Type: IR Signal Receiver x1 & IR Emitter x1 & USB x1 2.Receive Frequency Range: 20KHZ to 60KHZ 3.Receive Range: 10m/32ft 4.Emitters Range:10cm/3.9inch 5.Cord Length (USB to IR Receiver): 1.4m/4.5ft; Cord Length (IR Receiver to IR Emitters): 2m/6.5ft 6.Signal receiving angle 180° 7.USB output: 5V 8.LED flashes to confirm signal reception HOW TO USE: 1.Plug the USB into your TV, set top box or a 5V USB wall adapter(adapter not included) for supply power. 2.Paste the IR emitter(small end) on the signal receiver window receiving point of the appliances(up to 10cm/3.9inch). 1.Stick the IR receiver(big end) next to TV screen (Not on the screen) orin the line of sight of your remote control (up to 10m/ 32ft). 4.Check the battery in your remote Important Notes Test the cable before attaching with the adhesive backing Check that the USB TV port provides 5V USB power or use a USB wall charger Not compatible with a set-top box using (RF) radio frequency signals Bright sunlight or CFL light bulbs can cause interference

name: Cable Matters Infrared Remote Extender Cable - 10ft, IR Repeater Kit Cable, IR Extender, USB Infrared Remote Blaster Cord Up to 15ft Signal Range, NOT Compatible with RF Signals
short_description: IR Remote Control Cable: This IR remote control cable extends the signal to a video source like a Blu-ray player so it can be controlled from your TV. The blue LED in the IR receiver bulb verifies signal transmission.

Home Theater IR Extender: This home theater accessory repeats the IR signal to a DVD player, STB box, receiver, or other A/V source with an IR sensor. Route the infrared remote control extender cable neatly with a wall-mounted TV and install the IR transmitter in a concealed equipment closet to hide a CATV box while still controlling it remotely.

Easy Installation: Quickly set up this lightweight IR blaster cord. Place the IR transmitter near the source sensor and the IR receiver within line of sight of your remote. For best performance, keep the blue LED on the receiver facing forward—not upward—for stronger signal reception. IR Tx and Rx cables include adhesive backing for secure mounting.

USB Powered IR Extension Cable: The USB infrared remote blaster cord features an integrated 6-foot Y-cable to receive 5V USB power. Simply connect the USB cable to a 5V USB wall charger. Note: The TV's USB port does not supply power when it's off, use a USB wall charger instead.

Universal Compatibility: This IR extender cable works with most A/V equipment with infrared sensors (not RF). The 30-degree IR receiver angle provides flexibility for remote control operation. Check that your devices support IR signals before purchase. Does not work for RF signal devices.

Extended IR Signal Range: This IR extender supports up to a 15-foot IR signal range for reliable control even at a distance. For optimal performance, place the extender away from Wi-Fi routers or CFL bulbs to avoid interference.
product_details: Compatible Phone Models No compatible phone model

name: Sofabaton R1 Repeater for X2 Universal Remote Control, Infrared Wireless IR Repeater Remote Control Extender Kit, R1 Infrared Extender with Long Range Signal, Only Compatible with Sofabaton X2
short_description: Compatibility Notice: The R1 Repeater is designed exclusively for use with the Sofabaton X2 Universal Remote and newer Sofabaton remote. Please be advised that it will not work with the X1S universal remote control.

Never Be Blocked Again: Tired of IR signal blockers like walls and closed cabinets? Our extended IR blaster system ensures powerful, whole-home coverage. Control your AC, TV, and more from any room with the added range of a signal repeater.

Whole-Home IR Coverage: Equipped with 7 high-power emitters and a 3-meter wired IR blaster cable, this IR repeater provides 360° signal coverage to ensure stable, far-reaching control of your devices in every room.
Control devices from anywhere: Start the AC in your bedroom before you even enter, offering a new level of smart home convenience and comfort.
Powerful & Reliable Signal Transmission：Engineered with advanced signal-boosting technology to ensure every command is delivered instantly and accurately, without dropouts or delays.

Easy Setup, Instant Control: Simply plug in the Hub, position the R1 repeater, and you're ready to go. Macro-Friendly Operation, no need to point or precisely aim. The repeater triggers all devices simultaneously, making it ideal for one-touch macros.
Contains Everything for Setup: Get started right away with the R1 IR repeater, a 5V/1A power adapter, a USB-C to USB-A cable, and a 3-meter 3.5mm IR blaster—all included in the box.

name: IR Repeater Transmitter Kit Up to 15FT Signal Range - Infrared Remote Control Extender Universal IR Blaster Emitter with Receiver for Cable Box/STB/Amplifier (USB Powered, 10FT)
short_description: 【IR Extender】- This ir repeater kit consist of a IR Transmitter (smaller head) and a IR Receiver (bigger head) amd a USB power end (must connected to gain power), which allows you to extended the signal of a IR source like a Blu-ray player so it can be controlled from long distance, the red LED in IR Receiver bulb verifies the working status.

【49FT Control Range】- IR remote extender for tv supports up to 49 feet control distance at 45 degrees, you can realized to install the IR Transmitter end in the closet that hides the cable box, then install the IR Receiver outside and control it remotely, this way nothing messy will be seen only tidy and clean.

【Widely Compatibility】- IR extender for cable box repeats the IR signal of a DVD player, STB box, Amplifier, Receiver or other A/V sources with infrared signal to a wall mounted TV, so that you can remote control everything from a far and without puting the set top box out to avoid the dust.

【Easy to Use】- Simple installation of this universal IR cable: paste the IR Blaster head near the source (like cable box) to repeat the signal to the source, paste the IR Receiver in a convenient location (like under the TV) with line of sight of your hand-held remote, connect the USB to get power (5V) and start to enjoy.

【Worry-free Purchase】- If you can not get this Infrared Remote Control Extender to work for you, please do not hesitate to contact Herfair to get solution or full re-fu-nd, comes with 18 months warranty for every order. Tip: there are adhesive back for installation on the back of heads and please keep this extender away from routers.

name: Sewell SW-32988 Direct BlastIR Wireless Pro IR Repeater, Remote Control Extender Kit (IR Emitter and Receiver),Black
short_description: Note Some devices use RF instead of IR for remote control. The Blast IR Wireless Pro only works with IR devices. Please check the signal type of your remote to ensure it is IR before ordering. .Wireless Distance: 200m (650 ft.), distance may vary due to obstacles, IR Receiver Distance: 7m (30 ft.)Incompatibility : Yamaha HTR 6140, Arris DCX 3520E-M, OSD ATM-7 Speaker Selector

BlastIR Pro receivers are directional and require facing the receiver towards where you will be using the remote. To improve reception and widen the angle of control, we recommend using the included IR receiver cable connected to the main receiver unit.

BlastIR Pro Emitters work best when placed within a few inches of the devices you want to control. For best results we recommend attaching the included optional IR emitter cables so that the emitter is directly over the IR receiver of up to two devices. These are designed to stick directly to the devices that you are trying to control rather than sitting in front of them.
Included USB and AC power cables, extra IR cables, mounting adhesive, and rubber feet.
Wireless Distance: 200m (650 ft.), distance may vary due to obstacles, IR Receiver Distance: 7m (30 ft.)
Incompatibility : Yamaha HTR 6140, Arris DCX 3520E-M, OSD ATM-7 Speaker Selector
product_description: Multizone: Protect from Interference Most IR extenders are programmed to pass any signal that is sent through the receiver. Sometimes this may disrupt your setup as a few devices in your closet run on a similar IR frequency and cause interference with one another. The Multizone feature protects your devices from interference from other devices. This gives you the ability to have certain devices controlled only from specific areas in your setup. This has been a requested feature from many of our customers as they have extended IR signals but unintentionally were controlling two devices located in the same space. Cable boxes have especially been a pain since multiple cable boxes are easier to have based in the same area. Now with the BlastIR Wireless Multizone you are able to ensure you will only control the box that is attached to one of your TVs and not the other. The Channel IR System The Multizone feature works on a 10-channel system, this system gives you the ability to interact with your devices without needing to worry about your Wireless Extenders interfereing with one another. The system also gives you the option of using any number of transmitters or receivers on any given channel. This gives you complete freedom of choice for where your displays and devices can be placed without having to complicate your setup. The BlastIR Wireless Multizone Receivers will only communicate with the BlastIR Wireless Multizone Emitters that are set to the same channel. If you happen to own the classic BlastIR Wireless, this product will also work with it. Channel 0 on this product will allow IR signals to be sent between the two diffferent versions.

High sensitivity, Real time transmission without any delay with its high sensitivity sensor. Remote indication lights on IR receiver:green being power connected while flashing red indicates the signal is being sent. CFL friendly: this duafire unit can be installed in an area with compact fluorescent lighting and work in the most lighting environments

Note: plasma displays emit IR frequencies during use and may cause interference. It is advised to distance the IT receiver from any plasma TV or display ability to control multiple appliances at various locations up to 10 m1.
